questions.q: Is the following sentence a simile or a metaphor? The clouds are like soft pillows in the sky.
Is this sentence a simile or a metaphor? The world is a stage where we all perform.
Identify the literary device in the following sentence: Her eyes were sparkling jewels.
Is the following sentence a simile or a metaphor? The car roared down the road like a lion.
What literary device is used in this sentence? Time is a thief that steals our moments.
Does the sentence use a simile or a metaphor? The childâ€™s laughter was like music to her ears.
Identify the literary device in the following sentence: Life is a roller coaster with many ups and downs.
Is the following sentence a simile or a metaphor? His voice was as cold as ice.
What literary device is used in this sentence? The stars are diamonds in the night sky.
Does the sentence use a simile or a metaphor? She ran like the wind through the field.
